snippet: A selection of Joe Moses clips to go with this week's "They're Famous (on the Internet)" column.
abstract: A selection of Joe Moses clips to go with this week's "They're Famous (on the Internet)" column.
lead_paragraph: In college, I couldn't look at Facebook without a friend enthusiastically posting "A Very Potter Musical." That production, a parody by a group of University of Michigan students, is where Joe Moses, the subject of my They're Famous! (On the Internet) column this week, got his start playing a dramatic Severus Snape. The show was written by Matt Lang, Nick Lang and Brian Holden, and it features the "Glee" star Darren Criss (pre-"Glee") as Harry Potter.
